author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menu for `CMSSW_12_4_HLT_X`.
This update is meant *exclusively* for the Summer2024 production of Run 3 MC. 

**This PR is NOT a backport**.

This version of the GRun Frozen HLT menu corresponds to to the **"V1.5"** menu for the 2022 pp data-taking period.  The older version **"V1.4"** is removed. All TSG integration tests are updated accordingly.
This update includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:
   - [CMSHLT-2474](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2474): [TSG] fixes to PS values of 5 triggers (e.g. `HLT_ZeroBias_Alignment_v*`)
  -  [CMSHLT-2486](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2486): [BPH] new triggers with dz requirement for double-electron parking
  -  [CMSHLT-2487](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2487): [BPH] single-electron control trigger for double-electron parking triggers (currectly disabled, PS=0)
  -  [CMSHLT-2488](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2488): [BPH] another single-electron control trigger for double-electron parking triggers (currectly disabled, PS=0)
  -  [CMSHLT-2494](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2494): [EXO] fix to inclusive delayed-jet control trigger
  -  [CMSHLT-2366](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2366): [BTV] disable `DeepCSV` triggers of `GRun`
  -  [CMSHLT-2476](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2476): [TSG] seed of `HLT_EphemeralZeroBias` changed to `L1_ZeroBias_copy`
  -  [CMSHLT-2478](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2478): [MUO] removed some HLT-muon modules from `suppressWarning` list
  -  [CMSHLT-2491](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2491): [TSG] update PSs of `HLT_HT300_Beamspot` trigger
  -  [CMSHLT-2495](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2495): [TSG] update PSs of Ephemeral triggers
  -  [CMSHLT-2497](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2497): [TSG] added L1T seed to `HLT_EphemeralPhysics` (L1A Physics "masking" L1_ZeroBias_copy)
  - [CMSHLT-2499](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2499): [TSG] added `L1_SingleTau130er2p1` to L1T seeds using `L1_SingleTau120er2p1`
  -  [CMSHLT-2501](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2501): [EXO] added L1Tau-seeded delayed-jet triggers
  -  [CMSHLT-2514](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2514): [TSG] disable two displaced-dijet and two PNET triggers
  -  [CMSHLT-2518](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2518): [HIG] update of 1 L1T seed and 2 PSs of MSSM-Hbb control triggers
  -  [CMSHLT-2519](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2519): [TSG] disable 4 fatjet softdrop-mass triggers plus other PS changes
  -  [CMSHLT-2520](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2520): [BTV] updated PSs of BTagMu triggers
  -  [CMSHLT-2527](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2527): [EXO] updated L1T seed of SingleLLPJet triggers
  - [CMSHLT-2534](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2534): [JME] doubled PS of `AlCa_*PFJet*` triggers
  -  [CMSHLT-2537](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2537): [TSG] sync PSs of offline menu with V1.4.5 online menu
  -  [CMSHLT-2539](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2539): [TSG] use common PF-scouting sequence in `MC_Run3_PFScoutingPixelTracking_v` Path

This corresponds to the updates to the `GRun` subtable as in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39679 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39926

In addition, commit https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45939/commits/8d33e25b52d167b177e62717e85a822fbf474756 removes support for the frozen menu 2022 V1.2, unused for the Summer24 MC production.

#### PR validation:

TSG integration tests 

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, not to be forward-ported.
title: [`12.4_HLT_X`] HLT configurations for 2022 MC: from menu 2022 V1.4 to menu 2022 V1.5
